input.sentences: a lot of people were gathered for the conference on creative commons .
a video kicked off the program .
there was even a band on hand for entertainment
of course | everybody likes to have their picture taken with speakers .
output.sentences: A group of people gather for an event.
A tribute to the founder of the group plays on the screen.
His son dedicates the event to him.
A special band plays in honor of him.
After a successful event, the planning committee takes a photo.
